activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-server#11856
activity.text: /update_tests_results

activity.title: openfoodfacts/openfoodfacts-server#11856
activity.text:
When updating test results locally with make update_tests_results:

We get a 500 error:

```
not ok 63 - world-product-smoothie - Test status
# {
#   'url' => 'http://world.openfoodfacts.localhost/cgi/display.pl?/product/3300000000001/apple-pie-bob-s-pies?user_agent=smoothie',
#   'expected_type' => 'html',
#   'path' => '/product/3300000000001/apple-pie-bob-s-pies?user_agent=smoothie',
#   'method' => 'GET',
#   'expected_status_code' => 200,
#   'test_case' => 'world-product-smoothie'
# }
# Response status line: 500 Internal Server Error
ok 64 - world-product-smoothie - result
```


in logs/apache2/modperl_error_log:

`] -e: Undefined subroutine &ProductOpener::Display::is_beverage_for_nutrition_score called at /opt/product-opener/lib/ProductOpener/Display.pm line 10089.\n`


It was replaced by is_beverage_for_nutrition_score_2023, I'll fix it

activity.text: chore: new ingredients

open_prs.title: Max salt not taken into account in ingredient percent estimation
Ignored specified percent in ingredient parsing: Butter (milk) 34%
Remove support for jqm jquerymobile / old Phonegap / Cordova app
Migrate images object to new schema
Use off-query to query list of products by popularity sorted by country scans
Use readocly instead of rapidoc to generate API documentation from OpenAPI spec
Remove social media links to X and Facebook, add LinkedIn
Store input tags separately from parent tags for brands, categories, labels etc. taxonomies
OFF query migration to Python
New API for image upload, selection and retrieval
Don't generate robots.txt on every request
If the user form is submitted without authentication, redirect to login but keep entered data
User deletion does not work on OPFF, OPF, OBF
Vegan label ingredient parsing issue in Finnish product
Extract GS1 GDSN diet types (vegan, vegetarian) in pro platform imports
Routing issue on pro platform for ingredients
Compute Nutri-Score on prepared nutrition facts if as sold not available
Create simple permanent URLs for front images of products
Personal search preferences in /api/v0/preferences do not match what is used on the website
Nutri-Score panel: add possible reasons when Nutri-Score(s) computed different than Nutri-Score on package
Footer links for "Who we are" and "Partners" broken in German, Italian, Spanish, Dutch and other languages
Generate and update CSV and RDF exports through a PostgreSQL table
Use consistent field names and taxonomy names (same as Product Opener)
Add an ingredient box to add any ingredient by typing its name
Docker Makefile calls nproc which does not work on Windows
Ingredient specific labels applied to whole product when there are more than one
Values from user defined nutrients cannot be completely removed from the nutriments
Simplify the templates that render knowledge panels on the web
On off2, Apache not restarted after oom kill, even with Restart=on-abort
Do not use image size to determine if a product image is a duplicate
